segments.text: I expect to be paid according to my abilities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you feel about an annual salary of 100,000 Yuan plus bonus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a little less than I expected . But to me , the most important thing is the job and the people I will work with . Moreover , I am sure I will get a raise quickly depending on my background and experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , how long is my probation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Generally it is 6 months and during this period you are half-paid .
segments.speaker: S1
